page.title: 08TRANSPORT.
page.content: THE MAIN MODE OF TRANSPORT IN THIS AREA IS BY SEA. THERE ARE 4 BOATS "SPANISH JOHN","BOMBER","EUNA MARA" AND "FRANGAG". {"SPANISH JOHN"}IS A 55FT LANDING CRAFT WHICH CARRIES CARGO,12 PASSENGERS AND 4 CARS. {"BOMBER" }IS A 26FT ALL PURPOSE LAUNCH BUT USED MAINLY IN THE STALKING SEASON FOR BRINGING GAME HOME FROM A DISTANCE. {"EUNA MARA" }FAST LAUNCH(30 KNOTS)USED TO BRING GUESTS TO THE LODGES. {"FRANGAG" }20 KNOT LAUNCH USED BY GLASCHOILLE LODGE AND ALSO IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY. TRANSPORT THROUGH THE VILLAGE IS BY PRIVATE CAR. LANDROVERS,SUZUKIS AND JEEPS ARE USED AS WORK TRANSPORT.
